content: the bobble pumpkin pillow crochet pattern will show you how to make the perfect cozy handmade addition to your fall decor this pillow has a slightly rustic farmhouse vibe and is constructed of two flat panels worked in row then joined around a pillow insert the main stitch is herringbone half_double_crochet which gives a great slanted texture and the bobbles add a fun raised effect stitch tutorials included for both this is an intermediate level pattern but an advanced beginner could definitely tackle it this download includes a written pattern a chart for the pumpkin panel detailing the stitch pattern and color changes and helpful step-by-step pictures *please note that the chart is the primary source of instruction for the pumpkin panel - instructions and examples are given for how to follow the chart make the bobble pumpkin pillow for yourself or give it as a housewarming gift or fall birthday gift i hope you love this pattern browse my ravelry store to find more fall patterns this listing is for a printable pdf version of this crochet pillow cover pattern visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern with ads pattern download - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions a detailed chart and step-by-step pictures - a quick print no pictures version of this pattern is included in the download - this pattern will be delivered to you in the form of a digital file pdf - upon purchase this pattern will be instantly available for you to download skill level intermediate this pattern requires color changes and uses a variety of intermediate level stitches herringbone half_double_crochet bobble stitch and reverse single_crochet instructions are included for all stitches as well as links to video tutorials the pumpkin panel requires following a crochet chart instructions and examples are given dimensions each panel is approximately 18 square back panel may be slightly smaller and should fit over an 18 pillow insert materials you will need about 700 yards of worsted weight yarn i needed 3 skeins for the ivory background one skein of orange for the pumpkin and a small amount of brown and green for the details you will also need a size h 5 00mm crochet hook an 18 pillow insert and scissors share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #bobblepumpkinpillow hashtag to show off your new project copyright the bobble pumpkin pillow pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
